price: 7. Ma jirin Nabi u yimaada oo aysan ku jees-jeesin.
arabic: وَمَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن نَّبِيٍّ إِلَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā yatīhim min nabiyyin illā kānū bihi yastahziūna
